Class AudioManager

java.lang.Object
game.managers.AudioManager
public class AudioManager extends Object
Manages all audio and music in the game. Handles background music themes, sound effects, and volume control.

Features:

  • Theme music management (intro, morning, sunset, midnight)
  • Sound effects for game actions (jump, coin, damage, etc.)
  • Automatic music switching for theme transitions
  • Volume control

      Returns:
      the corresponding MediaPlayer, or null if not found

    • playSoundEffect

      private void playSoundEffect(String soundPath, double volume)
      Helper method to play a sound effect once. Creates a new MediaPlayer instance for each play.
      Parameters:
      soundPath - the resource path to the sound file
      volume - the volume level (0.0 to 1.0)
